## Severity Assessment
- [ ] **Critical** - Game crashes or data loss
- [ ] **High** - Major feature broken, blocks progression
- [ ] **Medium** - Feature partially broken, workaround exists
- [ ] **Low** - Minor visual/audio issue, doesn't affect gameplay
